name: Never Set
description:
After being trapped in an unfamiliar world where the sun never sets, an aggressive and conflicted fourteen year old must find a way to battle her inner feelings and thoughts linked to her past in order to overcome her fears. With only a baseball bat and a mysterious new friend to help uncover the confusion of her dilemma, will she be able to succeed and move forward into a peaceful future?

Siriah - Concept Art/UI Art/Character Models
Daniel - Level Design/Unreal Programming
Sean - Prototyping/Key Programmer

Pekka Kolehmainen (Rahkoi) - Manifestations
Kai Engel - Smouldering

Matt Payne (Environment Art)
Joshua Oxley (Misc Modelling)
Our Parents, Pets, Chairs and Computers.
